title: Apollo to Buy Griffin Capital Units in Push to Reach Wealthy Individuals
sub_head: Deal will add about $5 billion of assets under management in products designed for individual investors
body:
Apollo Global Management Inc. has agreed to buy the U.S. wealth-distribution and asset-management businesses of Griffin Capital Co., marking a big step in the investment giantâ€™s plan to expand its offerings for wealthy individuals.
The deal will be paid for with Apollo stock, the firm said Thursday. Apollo declined to disclose the price it is paying for the two business units, which make up the majority of Griffin.
